catch_copy: Run an ever-evolving, paint-fuelled factory and create magical, shape-based warriors! Send them into battle, then build an even better factory on your next run.
copyright_text: © 2024 Asobism Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
description:
Welcome to the world’s weirdest factory. You don’t swing swords or cast spells, instead you build tiny heroes out of shapes, and hope for the best as they come up against endless swarms of increasingly brutal enemies. All in a day’s work!

*BUILD IT WEIRED. BUILD IT STRONG.
•Drop shapes onto conveyor belts to craft self-operation heroes.
•Want a soldier? Try a circle and a triangle.
•Want a tank? Try circle and square.
•Heroes fight on their own, you’re just there to make the decisions.

*EVERY WAVE IS A TEST
•Enemies get weirder, stronger and ruder as you progress 
•Defend your Portal from swarming pests and brute squads 
•Earn magical artifacts and upgrade your factory like there's no tomorrow.

*DIFFERENT MASTER DIFFERENT RUN
•Different playable characters - ‘Masters’ - have different hero types and build strategies
•Experiment with different characters to unlock their Arcane Knowledge (permanent upgrades) 
•Find a playstyle that suits you best

*YOUR FACTORY IS THE REAL HERO
You can’t control your troops, but you can outsmart the darkness waiting to gobble up your kingdom, one conveyor belt at a time.

notices.text:
This title was released for Nintendo Switch™ and can also be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2.

After the release date, players who own the Nintendo Switch™ version of this title will be able to get the Nintendo Switch™ 2 version free of charge.

Please note that save data from the Nintendo Switch™ version isn’t compatible with the Nintendo Switch™ 2 version.
Also, this title does not include a Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition or a Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pass.

strong_disclaimer:
This title is only playable on Nintendo Switch™ 2.

After the release date, players who own the Nintendo Switch™ version of this title will be able to get the Nintendo Switch™ 2 version free of charge.

Please note that save data from the Nintendo Switch™ version isn’t compatible with the Nintendo Switch™ 2 version.
